name: Old-Fashioned Whisky Cocktail
instruction: Stir well until the sugar is dissolved. Squeeze lemon peel on top and serve in the same glass.

name: Old Pal Cocktail
note: Recipe by 'Sparrow' Robertson, Sporting Editor of the New York Herald, Paris.

name: Old Potato Cocktail
note: Recipe by Al Smith, New York.

name: Olivette Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass with an olive. Squeeze lemon peel on top.

name: Olympic Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.
note: Recipe from Frank Meyer, Ritz, Paris.

name: Once Over Cocktail
note: Recipe by Herol Egan, Houston, Texas.

name: Opera Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Squeeze orange peel on top.

name: Orangeade
instruction: Fill half a tumbler with shaved ice. Add ingredients and stir well. Serve with a straw.

name: Orange Blossom
instruction: Shake well and strain into a small wineglass.

name: Orange Squash
instruction: Same as Orangeade but use soda water instead of plain water.

name: Orgeat Lemonade
instruction: Fill half a tumbler with shaved ice. Add ingredients, stir well, and serve with a straw.

name: Orgeat Punch
instruction: Fill half a whisky tumbler with shaved ice. Stir well, decorate with seasonal fruits, and serve with straws.

name: Ostende Fizz
instruction: Shake well and strain into a medium-sized tumbler. Fill with soda water.
